documents.document: @charminglydaft @PaulineHansonOz @australian And did you think it in Inigo Montoyez's voice? 😉

@greyparker @JoyAnnReid @POTUS Just shows them for the pathetic hypocrites that they are.

@YaThinkN Pig-ignorant buttinski. Just block the idiot.
If Trump was the answer, imagine how incoherent the question must have been!
@GeorgeFouracres @robwillb If Jesus actually did return, they'd never accept him. He'd be too much of a "bleeding heart lefty" for them.

@HarrisWarren20 @realDonaldTrump His definition of "fake news" is "anything that makes me look bad".

Really love being the one who always has to fix other people's fuck-ups... 😡😡😡
@AnneWheaton Yeah, I need to get me one of those for work.
@girlie_swot And the Marine bases here.

@movieator @pattonoswalt Pfft. It's just a huntsman spider. They aren't venomous.
@LindaLindae9 @daisyxmaisy @LocalJudi @brhodes True, I'm ashamed to say.
Time to seek new alliances, I think. We obviously can't trust Trump to hold up his end of the existing one. Cut him loose, @TurnbullMalcolm

@tedlieu It's ok. We know he doesn't speak for all of you.
Face it, Turnbull. Trump's just not that into you. #dumpthechump

What do you think of Trump now, @TurnbullMalcolm, @JulieBishopMP? https://t.co/Dch3SdRheN

Actually, now I think about it, there are quite a few similarities between Trump and @KngHnryVIII: 1. Ginger 2. Unstable 3. A few wives
@iMusing What about single dads? They too lazy to attract and hold a mate, too?
Oh, dear. Steve Bannon compares himself to Thomas Cromwell, one of Henry VIII's closest advisors. Who wants to tell Steve how that ended?
@InnesKay @JacquiLambie It's not free. WE PAY FOR IT THROUGH THE MEDICARE LEVY.

@verbaliza I'll pat any cat that comes along, me.
@charminglydaft You know the sort. They regard themselves as holy, and set apart from lesser mortals, simply because they reproduced.
